ActivityLogText.TAMPERED_VC_REMOVED: {{idType}} {{id}} is removed from from wallet due to tampering.

RemoveVcWarningOverlay.removeWarning:
You're going to remove the card from the wallet. Once removed, this action cannot be undone.
However, you can download the card again to your wallet.

AuthScreen.Description: To unlock the app securely, you can set up either biometric authentication, such as fingerprint or facial recognition or opt for a 6-digit Passcode for quick access.
AuthScreen.PasswordTypeDescription: Choose ‘Use Biometrics’ to enable biometric authentication or ‘I’ll Do Later’ to set up a 6-digit passcode.

errors.unenrolled: To use Biometrics, please enroll your biometrics in your device settings
errors.generic: There seems to be an error in Biometrics authentication

BannerNotification.alternatePasscodeSuccess: Success! You can now use passcode to unlock Inji app.
BannerNotification.alternateBiometricSuccess: Success! You can now use biometrics to unlock Inji app.
BannerNotification.activated: Credentials are enabled for online authentication.

AboutInji.aboutDetails: Biometrics Voters Verification App is a mobile app that can be used as a digital wallet to store Voter Ids. It also allows verification of identity in both offline and online modes, at any place and time.

IssuersScreen.title: Add new card
IssuersScreen.description: Please choose your preferred issuer from the options below to add a new card.

noInternetConnection.message: Please check your connection and retry

biometricsCancelled.title: Do you want to cancel download?

generic.title: Something went wrong!

inji.three: Giga Technopark Plot 23, Yusuf Lule Road, P.O. Box 7661, Kampala, Uganda

backend.missingUin: The entered UIN is deactivated/blocked. Please enter a valid UIN to proceed

DownloadingVcModal.bodyText: This may take sometime, we will notify you when your card has been downloaded and is available

GetIdInputModal.toolTipDescription: The Application ID (AID) refers to the unique identifier given to a resident during any ID lifecycle event, such as ID Issuance, ID Update, or Lost ID retrieval, at the registration center. It serves as a distinguishing factor for each specific event and can later be utilized by the resident to check the progress or status of the event.

IdInputModal.guideLabel: Select ID type and enter the MOSIP provided UIN or VID you wish to download. In the next step, you will be asked to enter OTP.
IdInputModal.getItHere: Get it now using your AID.
IdInputModal.toolTipUINDescription: Unique Identification Number (UIN), as the name suggests, is a unique number assigned to a resident. UIN never changes and is non-revocable.
IdInputModal.toolTipVIDDescription: The VID / Virtual ID is an alias identifier that can be used for authentication transactions. VID is known to the user only and is privacy friendly in a way such that it can be revoked, configured for one time usage and is not linkable.

OtpVerificationModal.title: OTP Verification
OtpVerificationModal.otpSentMessage: We've sent a 6 digit OTP to your registered mobile number: {{phone}} and Email Address: {{email}}
OtpVerificationModal.resendTheCode: You can resend the OTP in

confirmationDialog.title: Do you want to cancel downloading?
confirmationDialog.message: Once cancelled, your card will not be downloaded and you need to reinitiate the download.

MyVcsTab.searchByName: Search using Voter ID or Name
MyVcsTab.generateVcDescription: Tap on "Download card" below to download your card
MyVcsTab.generateVcFABDescription: Tap on  "+" below to download your card
MyVcsTab.downloadingYourCard: Downloading your card, this can take upto 5 minutes

OnboardingOverlay.stepOneText: Keep your digital credential with you at all times. Inji helps you manage and use them effectively. To get started, add cards to your profile.
OnboardingOverlay.stepTwoText: Share your cards securely in a hassle free way and avail various services.
OnboardingOverlay.stepThreeText: Store and carry all your important cards in a single trusted wallet.
OnboardingOverlay.stepFourText: Authenticate yourself with ease using the stored digital credential.
OnboardingOverlay.stepFiveText: Protect your data with ease using our Backup & Restore feature. Safely store your VCs against loss or accidents by creating regular backups and recover it effortlessly whenever needed for seamless continuity.

ReceivedVcsTab.noReceivedVcsText: Tap on Request below to receive card

PasscodeScreen.enterAlternateNewPassword: Your passcode is your key to access the app securely. Choose a 6-digit passcode which is unique and memorable, ensuring the safety of your data and privacy within the app.
PasscodeScreen.reEnterAlternatePassword: Confirm your passcode by entering it again. Once confirmed, your passcode will be securely set for accessing the app.

ScanScreen.shareWithSelfieMessage:
Before Voting, we’ll securely verify your identity using face verification. By continuing, you consent to Biometric Voters Verification App using your camera for this purpose. 

 Your facial data will only be used for verification and will not be shared with any third parties.
ScanScreen.shareWithSelfieMessageQrLogin:
In order to access the portal, you’ll need to share your Voter ID and verify your identity securely using face verification. By continuing, you consent to Biometric Voters Verification App using your camera for this purpose. 

 Your facial data will only be used for verification and will not be shared. After successful verification, you can choose which details to share.

BackupAndRestoreBanner.backupInProgress: Data backup is in progress. Please do not close the application.

backupFailure.networkError: Due to unstable internet connection, we were unable to perform data backup. Please try again later.
backupFailure.technicalError: Due to technical error, we were unable to perform data backup. Please try again later.
backupFailure.iCloudSignInError: We're sorry that data backup couldn't be completed. Please ensure that you have logged into your Apple account and iCloud access is enabled for the app.
backupFailure.noDataForBackup: We're sorry, but there is no data available to back up at the moment.
backupFailure.storageLimitReached: We're unable to complete the backup process due to insufficient storage space on your device. Please free up space by deleting unnecessary files or apps, and try again.

BackupAndRestoreBanner.restoreInProgress: Data restore is in progress. Please do not close the application.
BackupAndRestoreBanner.restoreSuccessful: Your backup has been restored successfully

restoreFailure.networkError: Due to unstable internet connection, we were unable to perform data restore. Please try again later.
restoreFailure.technicalError: Due to technical error, we were unable to perform data restore. Please try again later.

AccountSelection.backupProcessInfo: You’re just a few steps away from backing up your data
AccountSelection.cloudInfo: To initiate the data backup, please tap on the “Proceed” button to link your {{driveName}} with Inji.

BackupAndRestore.title: Backup & Restore
BackupAndRestore.backupInProgress: You can still use the application while data backup is in progress. Closing the app will terminate the data backup process.
BackupAndRestore.noBackup: Backup your Data to {{driveName}}. You can restore them when you reinstall INJI.
BackupAndRestore.storage: The backup will be stored in the {{driveName}} associated to your chosen {{accountType}} account.
BackupAndRestore.restoreInProgress: We're restoring your data, please do not close the application. You may continue using the application.

invalidateKeyError.title: App was Reset
invalidateKeyError.message: Due to the fingerprint / facial recognition update, app security was impacted, and downloaded cards were removed. Please download again.

errors.missingPermission: This app uses the camera to scan the QR code of another device.

errors.genericError: Something is wrong. Please try again later!

biometricPopup.title: Unlock App
biometricPopup.description: Please use fingerprint to unlock the app
